item.title: Open Science for Synthesis: Gulf Research Program Workshop
item.description: Dates: July 10 - July 28, 2017Location: Santa Barbara, CAVenue: NCEAS, 735 State St., Suite 300, UC Santa Barbara The primary goal of the Open Science for Synthesis: Gulf Research Program Workshop is to provide hands-on experience with contemporary open science tools from command line to data to communication. Team science is promoted. Practice and real data are used in groups to apply skills we explore. Week 1. Fundamental collaboration skills Introduction to command line, communicating science, R, meta-analysis and data management.
